pickle-track-log-header:
{{pickle-gloss}}

Description used on top of Special:log when filtered on this specific log.
pickle-console-title:
{{pickle-gloss}}

Area used for test reports. Can be empty, but will then have a message about this.
pickle-console-empty:
{{pickle-gloss}}

Message used to clarify that the output area is initially empty. It is injected into the test console as a placeholder for the later test output.
pickle-console-cleared:
{{pickle-gloss}}

Message used to clarify that the output area is cleared. It is injected into the test console as a placeholder for the cleared test output.
pickle-report-skip-no-message: {{pickle-gloss}} [Note for dev; delete entry?] Error message for non-existing message keys. Indicates a missing or wrong implementation, possibly on some kind of extension.
pickle-case-no-fixtures:
{{pickle-gloss}}

The tests has provided no fixtures, that is the function that should contain the tests has none. This will be marked as a "todo": {{msg-mw|Pickle-report-case-is-todo-keyword}}.
pickle-case-no-tests:
{{pickle-gloss}}

The tests has run no tests, that is the functions for the fixtures has no tests. This will be marked as an "todo": {{msg-mw|Pickle-report-case-is-todo-keyword}}.
pickle-adapt-catched-exception:
{{pickle-gloss}}

An exception has been caught during evaluation of a fixture. This can be due to assertions and spies, but can also be because of errors and other abrubt terminations.
pickle-adapt-catched-return:
{{pickle-gloss}}

A return value has beed been caught from evaluation of a fixture. This is a planned early return, and will often carry a result.
pickle-stub-no-fallback:
{{pickle-gloss}}

Tried to conditionally execute a on-empty fallback, and could not find any such function.
pickle-stub-no-more-frames:
{{pickle-gloss}}

A value was requested, but previous executions has reached end of precomputed values.
